about_the_game:
Welcome to Silentium 2D, a local, sharedscreen game which pits you and a friend (soon to be enemy) against eachother in 1v1 arcade combat!
Fight your foe in the city, the field, or even the freakin' moon! (Yes, the moon!). Take on hordes of robots in the solo 'Chaos' mode.
Inspired by various arcade games, Silentium 2D was a hobby project designed to let younger audiences get their hands on a keyboard and quickly learn the intuitive controls.

Best of all, it's affordable, fun, and can be played offline with a friend! Silentium 2D also supports Steam Remote Play. The controls are remarkably easy to use, and allows for anyone to play! By purchasing Silentium 2D, you support Frentwick Indie in making future titles!

We hope to see you on the virtual battlefield ;)
detailed_description:
Success!

So, after a critical bug in the game was finally fixed, we got things running normally again. We did have to remove some of the polish on the game to clear up the bug (such as death animations and smooth screen transitions) but, we will be re-integrating these this week!
